name: Smashout (Wolfaton)
description:
Smash your way through 10 floors of a collapsing building before you get crushhed by the roof, while fighting enemies and avoiding traps.

Inspired by the ludum dare 32 theme "An Unconventional Weapon" the player is armed with a gun that shoots bouncing balls.

Made for the #1GAM challenge May 2015

controls explained in-game
